message.content:
Research Mureka.ai music generation API for integration into a video editing plugin:

1. **API Access & Pricing**:
   - Does Mureka have a public API?
   - Pricing model (per generation, subscription, credits?)
   - Enterprise/B2B options
   - Rate limits

2. **Capabilities**:
   - Can it analyze a reference track and generate similar music?
   - "Sound-alike" or style transfer features
   - Instrumental vs vocal generation
   - Output formats and quality
   - Song length control

3. **Copyright & Licensing**:
   - Ownership of generated content
   - Commercial use rights for videos
   - YouTube Content ID safety

4. **Comparison to Suno**:
   - Key differences
   - Quality comparison
   - Speed comparison
   - Price comparison

Provide concrete findings with URLs and pricing where available.

input.query: Mureka AI music generator pricing plans API access
Mureka vs Suno AI music generation comparison 2025

Links: [{"title":"Mureka: Best AI Music Generator in 2025 to Create Unique ...","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/"},{"title":"Mureka API Platform","url":"https://platform.mureka.ai/pricing"},{"title":"6 Best AI Music API Platforms for Instant Royalty-Free Songs - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/ai-music-api/best-ai-music-api-platforms/"},{"title":"2025 Mureka AI Review - Features, Pricing, and Alternatives","url":"https://www.topmediai.com/ai-music/mureka-ai-review/"},{"title":"Make Original Music Using AI? - Mureka AI Music Generator","url":"https://www.topview.ai/blog/detail/make-original-music-using-ai-mureka-ai-music-generator"},{"title":"AI Generated Music Examples in 2025","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/home"},{"title":"Mureka API v1 | Experimental API for AI services","url":"https://useapi.net/docs/api-mureka-v1"},{"title":"Mureka AI: The Complete Guide to AI-Powered Music Generation - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/mureka/mureka-ai/"},{"title":"Mureka.ai – AI Music Generation Platform Overview - Skywork ai","url":"https://skywork.ai/blog/mureka-ai/"},{"title":"Mureka: AI Music Generator | ChatGate","url":"https://chatgate.ai/post/mureka/"}]

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Mureka AI music generator pricing plans and API access:

## Mureka AI Pricing Plans

### Consumer/Web Plans
Mureka offers a free trial with limited song credits. Paid plans include:
- **Basic Plan**: $10/month for 400 songs
- **Pro Plan**: $30/month for 1600 songs
- **Additional Credits**: $48 for 1600 extra songs(no content)The Pro plan costs $24 per month (billed annually at $288) and dramatically expands access: it supports 1,600 songs or 800 minutes of speech monthly, MP3/WAV/instrumental/stem downloads, 120 topical tracks, advanced editing (including region and melody extension), reference audio uploads, and even allows any voice (including humming input) to be the singer.(no content)Pro users also get professional text-to-speech, high-quality output, and voice cloning for commercial projects.

### API Access

Developers can integrate Mureka's capabilities into their own applications through a flexible API.(no content)API integration is available at platform.mureka.ai.(no content)The API supports all functionality of Mureka AI, including Pro subscription features such as the ability to upload and use custom soundtracks for reference, and to upload and use melodies (motifs). Mureka supports up to 10 concurrent generations per account in near real-time fashion, with an average generation time of 45 seconds (each generation produces two songs). Generated songs can be up to 5 minutes long depending on your lyrics. Currently, two web subscription plans are supported:
- **Pro**: $10/month with 500 songs (2 cents/song) or 250 min of speech (4 cents/min)
- **Premier**: $30/month with 2,000 songs (1.5 cents/song)

### Key Features Across Plans
Paid plans unlock the full feature set: higher-quality exports, unlimited or significantly increased generation credits, access to advanced customization tools, multi-track exports, and commercial usage rights.(no content)All six major AI music APIs (Suno, TemPolor, Beatoven, Mubert, Mureka, 302.AI) allow commercial use under paid tiers. Mureka even includes this by default in Basic and Pro plans.(no content)REST APIs are available across all platforms, and the Mureka developer platform offers full SDKs + dashboards.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Here's the information I found about Mureka.ai API documentation and music generation for 2025:

## Mureka.ai API Platform

Mureka is the first and only official API platform provider in the AI music industry. It offers secure and compliant services, backed by direct technical support from the core development team — ensuring reliability and peace of mind.

### API Documentation & Capabilities

The official API documentation is available at **platform.mureka.ai/docs/**

In addition to their consumer platform, Mureka offers B2B services, providing customized integration and content solutions for different clients. Whether you work in social networking, voice chat, gaming, education, customer service, podcasting, audiobooks, entertainment, or media — or you're a music software developer, creative tool provider, app developer, AI technology company, or game studio — they can provide solutions that fit your needs.(no content)They provide clients with development capabilities access to APIs consistent with Mureka's core product, and every time they release a new model iteration, the API updates accordingly.

### Key API Features

Mureka AI offers a flexible AI music API built for creators, agencies, and teams needing commercial-safe tracks, stems, and clear rights documentation. Features include text-to-music generation (turning mood, genre, and vibe prompts into finished tracks) with output formats including MP3, WAV, and stems for Pro tiers.(no content)The Mureka developer platform offers full SDKs and dashboards.

### Latest Models (2025)

Mureka's consumer product, launched in 2024 by parent company Skywork AI, has undergone rapid iteration, culminating in the V7.5 model released in July 2025.(no content)Mureka also announced the groundbreaking O1 Music Generation System, setting a new benchmark for creative expression with comprehensive multilingual capabilities, scenario-driven background music (BGM) generation, and cutting-edge AI editing features.

### Business API Capabilities

For business applications, Mureka offers API integration capabilities enabling third-party implementation, custom model fine-tuning options allowing users to train personalized models based on their music libraries, and scalable infrastructure supporting high-volume generation requests. The platform enables companies in AI, music, video and audio, education, and gaming to unlock new possibilities through advanced production tools and music services.

### Additional API Features

The platform can generate lyrics and music seamlessly across 10 major languages spanning the Americas, Europe, and Asia, covering diverse genres and styles.(no content)Users can obtain separate tracks for vocals, instrumental accompaniments, and additional layers, enabling flexible mixing, detailed editing, and limitless creative opportunities.(no content)Additional API offerings include an AI Podcast API that automatically converts scripted dual-person dialogues into complete, natural-sounding podcast episodes, and a Premium Voice Selection API with a curated library of premium, lifelike speaker voices.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Web search results for query: "Mureka vs Suno AI music generation comparison 2025"

Links: [{"title":"Suno vs Mureka | Which Tool is Better for AI Music Creation","url":"https://singify.fineshare.com/blog/ai-music-apps/suno-vs-mureka"},{"title":"Best AI Music Generator: 7 Top Tools to Create Your Next Hit - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/aimusic/best-ai-music-generator/"},{"title":"Best AI Music Generators: The Best Tools to Create Songs | Suno","url":"https://suno.com/hub/best-ai-music-generator"},{"title":"Which is the Best AI Music Model in 2025? | 4 Comparisons | by 302.AI | Medium","url":"https://medium.com/@302.AI/which-is-the-best-ai-music-model-in-2025-4-comparisons-2648a8939028"},{"title":"Suno AI: The Revolutionary Music Generation Platform - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/aimusic/suno-ai/"},{"title":"I Tested The New Mureka AI Music Generator — Is It Better Than Suno And Udio?","url":"https://www.aimusicpreneur.com/ai-tools-news/mureka-ai-music-generator-tutorial-suno-udio-comparison/"},{"title":"Best AI Music Generators in 2026: Suno vs Udio vs AIVA Compared - Superprompt","url":"https://superprompt.com/blog/best-ai-music-generators"},{"title":"Mureka vs Suno | ChampSignal","url":"https://champsignal.com/comparisons/mureka.ai-vs-suno.com"},{"title":"Mureka.ai Review 2025-An Expert's Deep Dive into the AI Music Generator - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/mureka/mureka-ai-review-2025/"},{"title":"Mureka.ai: In-Depth Report and Comparison with Suno.ai | by AIToolScan | Medium","url":"https://medium.com/@aitoolscan/mureka-ai-in-depth-report-and-comparison-with-suno-ai-7d863180bfdb"}]

Based on my search, here's a comprehensive comparison of Mureka vs Suno AI music generation in 2025:

## Mureka vs Suno AI Music Generation Comparison (2025)

### Overview

Mureka (established 2024) is an AI-first music creation platform and studio that turns text or reference prompts into complete, royalty-free songs including lyrics, composition, vocals, and stems.(no content)Suno (established 2023) is a generative music platform that produces full songs combining realistic vocals and instrumentation from text prompts.

### Technology

Mureka employs sophisticated "MusiCoT" (Music Chain-of-Thought) technology for full-length song generation with better coherence.(no content)Mureka released its V7 version in July 2025 and introduced advanced architectures such as MusicCoT that are different from traditional Next Token predictions, aiming to improve the logic and structure of music.(no content)Mureka uses its own proprietary AI engine, SkyMusic 2.0, based on Diffusion Transformer architecture.(no content)The technology behind Suno AI is rooted in advanced machine learning models trained on vast amounts of musical data. Unlike tools that simply remix existing sounds, Suno generates original compositions from scratch.

### Key Features

**Mureka:**
- Rapid song generation from prompts/melodies: you can start with lyrics, text prompts, or a melody idea (hum or recorded motif), and Mureka will build instrumentation, arrangement, and vocals around it.
- Mureka lets you pick different vocal voices (timbres) for your songs, and with premium features, you can even upload your own voice for the AI to clone.
- Style Matching: Upload a reference track and Mureka generates music that mirrors its style. Supports 10 languages, stem separation, and DAW integration including compatibility with Ableton.
- Mureka offers a marketplace where users can buy, sell, and trade AI-generated music, adding a monetization layer for creators.

**Suno:**
- When it comes to generating complete, radio-ready songs with vocals, Suno AI stands head and shoulders above the competition, with its ability to create full-length tracks complete with lyrics, melodies, harmonies, and professional-sounding vocals from simple text prompts.
- The platform offers two main modes: Simple mode (just describe what you want) and Custom mode (where you can specify lyrics, style tags, and title).
- With its v4.5 model now available on the free tier and v5 unlocked for paid users, it produces the most consistently impressive results with minimal effort.

### Sound Quality

"Sound quality is poorer than Suno. Generated lyrics… mostly better than Suno or Udio."(no content)The vocal quality in some alternatives is decent, though not quite as polished as Suno's. The voices occasionally have that slightly synthetic edge, particularly on longer notes.

### Ease of Use

Mureka's interface has a learning curve steeper than Suno or SongR, but still far gentler than traditional digital audio workstations.(no content)For absolute beginners who just want to type a sentence and get a song, Suno's interface is arguably simpler and more direct.

### Pricing

Suno AI maintains a free tier as of 2025. Free users receive 50 credits per day, which resets every 24 hours, allowing approximately 10 songs daily without paying.(no content)Paid plans start at $8 per month.(no content)Mureka pricing sits at $15/month for the standard plan, with a free trial offering limited generations.

### Best Use Cases

Choose Mureka if you're building an app or workflow and need an official music-generation API with programmatic song/instrumental creation, stems, and fine-tuning options.(no content)Choose Suno if you want the most polished prompt-to-song experience with convincing vocals and clearer paid-plan licensing for commercial use.

### Verdict

Mureka.ai excels in customization, multilingual support, and advanced editing, making it ideal for users seeking control and commercial use. Suno.ai is favored for its sound quality, affordability, and user-friendly experience, especially for those prioritizing quick, emotional music generation.(no content)Suno remains the best overall choice for most users thanks to its combination of quality, ease of use, and the v4.5 improvements now available for free.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Understanding “Significant Human Input” in 2025 | Mureka","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/aimusic/ai-music-copyright/"},{"title":"Mureka","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/create"},{"title":"AI Generated Music Examples in 2025","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/home"}]

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Mureka AI music, copyright, commercial use, and YouTube Content ID safety:

## Mureka AI Music: Copyright & Commercial Use Overview

### Commercial Use Rights
Every track created on Mureka is 100% royalty-free and cleared for commercial use. Creators can use the music with complete peace of mind, knowing their content is legally sound.(no content)Every piece of music comes with full commercial rights and usage rights for unlimited applications.(no content)Mureka.ai is legal for commercial use - paid plans include commercial rights.(no content)The pro plan includes studio-quality downloads, unlimited music generation capabilities, full commercial rights, and advanced features like stems separation for professional content creators.

### YouTube Content ID Safety
YouTube allows AI-generated music when creators hold the commercial rights. YouTube's Music Policies and Content ID system treat AI compositions similarly to stock music libraries, provided that the owner can verify licensing.(no content)By producing wholly original compositions, AI music generators eliminate the risk of Content ID claims and infringement notices.(no content)AI-generated music from Mureka is perfect for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and all social platforms. Since it's completely royalty-free and original music, you won't face copyright strikes or monetization issues.

### Ownership & Copyright Considerations
Mureka's policy ensures that users retain full rights to their AI-generated music, provided they contribute meaningful creative input through prompts and edits. This ownership guarantee empowers creators to register and commercialize tracks without platform-imposed restrictions.(no content)U.S. law mandates human authorship; purely algorithmic outputs lack the requisite creative mind. When AI tools generate music, the resulting work must include user-driven decisions—such as selecting a genre template, editing motifs, or rearranging sections—to qualify as an original work of authorship under federal statutes.

### Best Practices for Protection
Channels that upload AI tracks with licenses in their metadata avoid automated strikes and maintain monetization eligibility. Embedding copyright-safe background music into videos involves three steps: generate a track with defined mood and duration, download the license certificate, and include license details in the video description. This workflow ensures that any Content ID scan finds no conflicting rights.(no content)YouTube requires creators to disclose AI-generated content when it affects viewer trust, aligning with its broader AI content transparency policy effective October 2025. Monetization eligibility depends on adherence to community guidelines, copyright rules, and ad-friendly standards.

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Mureka AI music, copyright, commercial use, and YouTube Content ID safety:

## Mureka AI Music: Copyright & Commercial Use Overview

### Commercial Use Rights
Every track created on Mureka is 100% royalty-free and cleared for commercial use. Creators can use the music with complete peace of mind, knowing their content is legally sound.(no content)Every piece of music comes with full commercial rights and usage rights for unlimited applications.(no content)Mureka.ai is legal for commercial use - paid plans include commercial rights.(no content)The pro plan includes studio-quality downloads, unlimited music generation capabilities, full commercial rights, and advanced features like stems separation for professional content creators.

### YouTube Content ID Safety
YouTube allows AI-generated music when creators hold the commercial rights. YouTube's Music Policies and Content ID system treat AI compositions similarly to stock music libraries, provided that the owner can verify licensing.(no content)By producing wholly original compositions, AI music generators eliminate the risk of Content ID claims and infringement notices.(no content)AI-generated music from Mureka is perfect for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and all social platforms. Since it's completely royalty-free and original music, you won't face copyright strikes or monetization issues.

### Ownership & Copyright Considerations
Mureka's policy ensures that users retain full rights to their AI-generated music, provided they contribute meaningful creative input through prompts and edits. This ownership guarantee empowers creators to register and commercialize tracks without platform-imposed restrictions.(no content)U.S. law mandates human authorship; purely algorithmic outputs lack the requisite creative mind. When AI tools generate music, the resulting work must include user-driven decisions—such as selecting a genre template, editing motifs, or rearranging sections—to qualify as an original work of authorship under federal statutes.

### Best Practices for Protection
Channels that upload AI tracks with licenses in their metadata avoid automated strikes and maintain monetization eligibility. Embedding copyright-safe background music into videos involves three steps: generate a track with defined mood and duration, download the license certificate, and include license details in the video description. This workflow ensures that any Content ID scan finds no conflicting rights.(no content)YouTube requires creators to disclose AI-generated content when it affects viewer trust, aligning with its broader AI content transparency policy effective October 2025. Monetization eligibility depends on adherence to community guidelines, copyright rules, and ad-friendly standards.

input.prompt: Extract all API details: endpoints, authentication, rate limits, pricing, request parameters, response formats, and capabilities.

content.content:
# Mureka API v1 - Comprehensive Details

## Overview
The Mureka API v1 is an experimental interface for Mureka AI, a music generation service featuring the SkyMusic 2.0 model. It enables creation of unique songs based on lyrics, musical styles, vocal references, and uploaded custom content.

## Authentication
The documentation references account management endpoints but does not explicitly detail authentication mechanisms in the provided content. Setup instructions are available at the dedicated setup page.

## Supported Models
- **O2** (latest)
- V7.6
- V7.5

## Rate Limits & Concurrency
- Up to **10 concurrent generations** per account
- Average generation time: ~45 seconds (produces two songs per generation)
- Maximum song length: 5 minutes (depending on lyrics)

## Pricing Structure

### Web Subscription Plans
| Plan | Cost | Songs | Speech |
|------|------|-------|--------|
| Pro | $10/month | 500 songs (2¢/song) | 250 min (4¢/min) |
| Premier | $30/month | 2,000 songs (1.5¢/song) | 1,000 min (3¢/min) |
| Credit top-up | $48 | 1,600 songs (3¢/song) | — |

**Free Features:**
- Lyrics generation
- Instrumental downloading
- Stems downloading

## API Endpoints

### Account Management
- `GET /accounts` - List accounts
- `GET /accounts/{account}` - Get specific account
- `POST /accounts/{account}` - Create/update account
- `DELETE /accounts/{account}` - Delete account
- `GET /profile` - User profile

### Music Generation
- `POST /music/create` - Basic music creation
- `POST /music/create-advanced` - Advanced music creation
- `POST /music/create-instrumental` - Instrumental generation
- `POST /music/extend` - Extend existing songs
- `POST /music/regenerate` - Regenerate songs
- `POST /music/lyrics-generate` - Generate lyrics
- `POST /music/video-generate` - Generate music videos
- `POST /music/download` - Download generated music
- `GET /music` - List music
- `GET /music/{song_id}` - Get specific song
- `DELETE /music/{song_id}` - Delete song
- `GET /music/moods-and-genres` - Available moods/genres
- `GET /music/vocals` - Available vocal options
- `GET /music/refs` - Reference songs

### File Management
- `POST /files` - Upload files
- `GET /files` - List files
- `GET /files/youtube` - YouTube content
- `DELETE /files` - Delete files
- `POST /files/motif` - Upload melodies
- `POST /files/vocal` - Upload custom vocals
- `DELETE /files/vocal` - Delete custom vocals

### Text-to-Speech
- `POST /speech` - Generate speech
- `GET /speech` - List speech
- `DELETE /speech` - Delete speech
- `GET /speech/voices` - Available voices
- `POST /speech/voice` - Custom voice cloning
- `DELETE /speech/voice` - Delete custom voices

## Capabilities

**Music Generation:**
- User-provided or AI-generated lyrics
- Multiple musical style selection
- Custom vocal references
- User-uploaded soundtracks for reference
- User-uploaded melody/motif integration

**Text-to-Speech:**
- Custom voice cloning from audio samples
- Multi-turn conversations with multiple voices

**Features:**
- Pro subscription features fully supported via API
- Near real-time generation
- Concurrent generation support

## Resources
- [Setup Documentation](/docs/start-here/setup-mureka)
- [Postman Collection](https://www.postman.com/useapinet/useapi-net/collection/uqtbn07/mureka-api-v1-by-useapi-net)
- Community: Discord, Telegram, Reddit (r/murekaai_api)

Links: [{"title":"FAQ | Mureka API Platform","url":"https://platform.mureka.ai/docs/en/faq.html"},{"title":"Mureka API v1 | Experimental API for AI services","url":"https://useapi.net/docs/api-mureka-v1"},{"title":"A guide to managing REST API rate limits","url":"https://www.merge.dev/blog/rest-api-rate-limits"},{"title":"Mureka API Platform","url":"https://platform.mureka.ai/"},{"title":"Mureka: AI Music API Platform - AI Tools Explorer","url":"https://aitoolsexplorer.com/ai-tools/mureka-ai-music-api-platform/"},{"title":"Unleash Your AI Agent's Inner Composer: A Deep Dive into the Official Mureka.ai Music Generation MCP Server","url":"https://skywork.ai/skypage/en/ai-music-generation-composer/1981599266437656576"},{"title":"2025 Mureka AI Review - Features, Pricing, and Alternatives","url":"https://www.topmediai.com/ai-music/mureka-ai-review/"},{"title":"Concurrent request restriction - API - OpenAI Developer Community","url":"https://community.openai.com/t/concurrent-request-restriction/1062443"},{"title":"Rate Limits for LLM Providers","url":"https://www.requesty.ai/blog/rate-limits-for-llm-providers-openai-anthropic-and-deepseek"},{"title":"Monitoring and troubleshooting rate limits | Okta Developer","url":"https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-best-practices/"}]

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Mureka API rate limits, concurrent requests, and generation time:

## Mureka API Rate Limits & Concurrent Requests

### Concurrent Request Limits
"Concurrent requests" refers to the number of song generation tasks that can be processed simultaneously.(no content)Each task is counted from the launch of the request to the completion of song generation.(no content)If your concurrency limit is 5, you can submit 5 song generation tasks at the same time. If the limit is 10, you can submit 10 at once, and so on.(no content)Higher-value top-up tiers offer a higher number of concurrent requests.(no content)Mureka supports up to 10 concurrent generations per account in near real-time fashion, with an average generation time of 45 seconds (each generation produces two songs).

### Generation Time & Song Length
Generated songs can be up to 5 minutes long depending on your lyrics.(no content)Music generation isn't instantaneous. A complex song can take a minute or more.

### Pricing & Payment Structure
The API top-up is a one-time payment that is consumed gradually. It does not expire and remains valid until the balance is used up.(no content)Downloading songs is free of charge. However, using the multitrack (stems) feature requires a separate payment.

### Additional Features
The platform supports multiple concurrent API requests for high-volume users.(no content)Music production companies that need to scale audio for ads, video, or digital experiences can use Mureka's high-concurrency pricing tiers to automate content creation.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Links: [{"title":"Mureka AI: The Complete Guide to AI-Powered Music Generation - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/mureka/mureka-ai/"},{"title":"Mureka - AI Music Generator App - App Store","url":"https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mureka-ai-music-generator/id6677033144"},{"title":"Mureka.ai Review 2025-An Expert's Deep Dive into the AI Music Generator - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/mureka/mureka-ai-review-2025/"},{"title":"Mureka - AI Song&Music Maker - Apps on Google Play","url":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.mureka.android&hl=en_US"},{"title":"Generating Music and Songs Using Mureka AI","url":"https://www.labellerr.com/blog/mureka-ai/"},{"title":"2025 Mureka AI Review - Features, Pricing, and Alternatives","url":"https://www.topmediai.com/ai-music/mureka-ai-review/"},{"title":"Mureka: AI Music Generator | ChatGate","url":"https://chatgate.ai/post/mureka/"},{"title":"Mureka.ai – AI Music Generation Platform Overview - Skywork ai","url":"https://skywork.ai/blog/mureka-ai/"},{"title":"Why Your AI Songs Sound Different Every Time — And How to Write Consistent AI Music Prompts | Mureka","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/aimusic/why-your-ai-songs-dont-sound-the-same-twice/"},{"title":"Mureka - AI SongMusic Maker APK for Android - Download","url":"https://mureka-ai-songmusic-maker.en.softonic.com/android"}]

Based on my search results, here's what I found about Mureka AI's reference audio upload and style matching features:

## Mureka AI Reference Audio & Style-Matching Features

Mureka's style reference feature lets you upload or link to an example track, and the AI will analyze its characteristics, tempo, and instruments.(no content)This doesn't mean you're copying someone else's work. Think of it as giving the AI a creative direction, like telling a producer, "I want something in the vibe of early 2000s indie rock" or "Make it sound like a lo-fi hip-hop beat." The result is original, but informed by the reference you provided.

### How It Works

You can generate songs from lyrics, simple text prompts, humming a melody into your microphone, or uploading a reference track or YouTube link to capture a specific vibe. The AI doesn't copy the reference; it analyzes its components (rhythm, mood, instrumentation) to create something entirely new.(no content)If you have a specific style in mind, just upload a reference track or paste a YouTube link. Mureka's AI analyzes the genre, rhythm, instrumentation, and mood of the reference, then generates new music that closely matches the desired vibe.

### AI Style-Matching Generation

Mureka's AI Style-Matching Generation feature allows you to upload a favorite track and the AI will instantly generate a new piece that mirrors its style and vibe.(no content)You can upload a reference track, and Mureka's AI music generator will quickly create a song in a similar style, closely matching your desired vibe.

### Additional Style Features

Users can upload reference audio, paste a YouTube link, or hum a tune — Mureka.ai builds a track around it.(no content)Incorporating short descriptions of reference audio or melodic motifs—"in the style of a 90s R&B bassline motif"—gives the model concrete style anchors. These references function as style transfer cues that align harmony, rhythm, and tone across generations. Consistent motif usage ensures stable character in each rendition.

### Customization Options

You also get granular control over musical parameters: adjust tempo, key, energy level, and instrumentation. This level of flexibility means you're not stuck with a single output—you can iterate and refine until the track matches your vision.(no content)Users can upload audio, motifs, or YouTube links as reference for AI composition.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Links: [{"title":"Mureka API Platform","url":"https://platform.mureka.ai/pricing"},{"title":"6 Best AI Music API Platforms for Instant Royalty-Free Songs - Mureka AI","url":"https://www.mureka.ai/hub/ai-music-api/best-ai-music-api-platforms/"},{"title":"Mureka Reviews, Alternatives, and Pricing updated December 2025","url":"https://opentools.ai/tools/mureka"},{"title":"2025 Mureka AI Review - Features, Pricing, and Alternatives","url":"https://www.topmediai.com/ai-music/mureka-ai-review/"},{"title":"FAQ | Mureka API Platform","url":"https://platform.mureka.ai/docs/en/faq.html"},{"title":"Mureka API v1 | Experimental API for AI services","url":"https://useapi.net/docs/api-mureka-v1"},{"title":"Mureka AI O1 & V6: Revolutionizing AI Music Generation","url":"https://merlio.app/blog/mureka-ai-music-o1-v6"},{"title":"Mureka Unveils Music Agent Studio and Enhanced API Capabilities, Bringing Professional Music Creation to Everyone | The Manila Times","url":"https://www.manilatimes.net/2025/10/14/tmt-newswire/globenewswire/mureka-unveils-music-agent-studio-and-enhanced-api-capabilities-bringing-professional-music-creation-to-everyone/2200034"},{"title":"Generating Music and Songs Using Mureka AI","url":"https://www.labellerr.com/blog/mureka-ai/"},{"title":"Mureka: AI Music API Platform - AI Tools Explorer","url":"https://aitoolsexplorer.com/ai-tools/mureka-ai-music-api-platform/"}]

Based on my search, here's what I found about Mureka API enterprise and B2B pricing for custom integrations:

## Mureka API - Enterprise & B2B Information

### Enterprise Offerings
Enterprise options are available via the Mureka developer platform for larger integrations.(no content)Mureka offers a Developer API for text-to-music, multi-format outputs, and B2B integrations.

### Enterprise Features
For enterprise clients, the platform offers comprehensive API integration, custom model fine-tuning, audio analysis and description tools, scalable infrastructure for high-volume requests, and full commercial licensing rights.(no content)The Describe Song API continues Mureka's commitment to providing developers and businesses with enterprise-grade tools that seamlessly integrate AI music capabilities into diverse applications and workflows.

### API Pricing Structure
The API top-up is a one-time payment that is consumed gradually. It does not expire and remains valid until the balance is used up.(no content)Downloading songs is free of charge. However, using the multitrack (stems) feature requires a separate payment.

### Consumer/Basic Pricing (for reference)
The Basic Plan starts at $8/month (billed annually), providing 400 credits per month, MP3 downloads, a commercial license for generated music, and priority queue access.(no content)Mureka AI offers a limited free trial with a few song credits. After that, users can subscribe to paid plans starting from $10/month for 400 songs.

### Custom Integration Capabilities
For developers and businesses, Mureka offers an API that allows seamless integration of its music generation capabilities into other apps, games, or digital platforms. The API supports custom fine-tuning, enabling brands to create unique sound experiences that match their identity.(no content)Music production companies that need to scale audio for ads, video, or digital experiences can use Mureka's high-concurrency pricing tiers to automate content creation.

### Licensing
All music generated with Mureka AI is royalty-free and comes with full commercial usage rights, making it ideal for content creators and businesses.

For specific enterprise B2B pricing details and custom integration quotes, you would need to contact Mureka directly through their developer platform at platform.mureka.ai, as enterprise pricing typically requires custom quotes based on usage volume and specific integration requirements.

Based on my search, here's what I found about Suno API pricing and developer access in 2025:

## Official Suno API Status

As of late 2025, Suno has not released an official, public API.(no content)The term "Suno API" almost exclusively refers to a collection of third-party services and open-source projects, not an official product.

## Pricing Information

### Official Suno Pricing (Consumer Plans)
Suno AI offers a tiered pricing model to cater to different user requirements. Each plan provides varying levels of access, features, and usage rights.

- The official Suno basic plan offers 50 free credits daily but with limited features.
- The Basic Plan is ideal for beginners and casual users who wish to explore AI-generated music without any financial commitment. However, creations under this plan cannot be used for commercial purposes.
- Credits on the free plan refresh every day. Paid plan credits refresh monthly.

### Third-Party API Pricing
The official Suno API is priced at approximately $0.04 per creation API call, with additional charges for continuation calls.(no content)CometAPI offers Suno Music Generation at $0.144 per create API call.(no content)Based on testing of all major providers, third-party implementations typically offer 50-75% cost savings with minimal quality differences for most use cases.

## Third-Party API Options

GoAPI provides an unofficial Suno API designed to boost users' text-to-music generation capabilities.(no content)Pay-per-use (PPU): Just top up credits at GoAPI's dashboard and use the API right away. The benefit of the PPU option is that you don't need to have your own Suno accounts to use the Suno API, as you will be using their account pools instead.

### Third-Party API Features
Third-party providers offer APIs for the latest AI music models, including Suno V5, V4.5 Plus, V4.5 All, V4.5, and V4, offering high-quality music generation. They support creation of both vocal and instrumental tracks, music extension, and multi-format downloads.(no content)All music generated through some third-party APIs is watermark-free, making it immediately suitable for commercial projects.

## Considerations for Developers

When evaluating providers, consider: Output Quality (some lower-priced providers may use compressed models), Rate Limiting (check concurrent request limitations), Output Rights (verify commercial usage rights for generated content), and Watermarking (some services add watermarks to generated audio).(no content)While Suno's models are trained on licensed data, the output is considered original. However, the legal landscape for AI-generated content continues to evolve, so it's advisable to stay informed on current regulations.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.text:
Based on my research, here is a comprehensive overview of the Mureka.ai music generation API for integration into your video editing plugin:

---

## Mureka.ai API Research Summary

### 1. API Access and Pricing

**API Availability**: Yes, Mureka has an official public API. They position themselves as "the first and only official API platform provider in the AI music industry."

**API Documentation**: [platform.mureka.ai/docs/](https://platform.mureka.ai/docs/)

**Pricing Model** (Credit-based, pay-per-use):

| Plan | Cost | Credits | Per-Song Cost |
|------|------|---------|---------------|
| Pro | $10/month | 500 songs | $0.02/song |
| Premier | $30/month | 2,000 songs | $0.015/song |
| Credit Top-up | $48 one-time | 1,600 songs | $0.03/song |

- Top-up credits never expire
- Downloading songs is free
- Stems/multitrack requires separate payment
- Lyrics generation is free

**Enterprise/B2B Options**: Available via [platform.mureka.ai](https://platform.mureka.ai/). Custom quotes required for:
- Custom model fine-tuning
- High-concurrency pricing tiers
- Scalable infrastructure for high-volume requests
- Contact them directly for enterprise pricing

**Rate Limits**:
- Up to 10 concurrent generations per account
- Higher concurrency available in premium tiers
- Average generation time: ~45 seconds (produces 2 songs per generation)
- Maximum song length: 5 minutes

---

### 2. Capabilities

**Reference Track Analysis (Style Matching)**: YES - This is a key feature

The style reference feature lets you:
- Upload a reference audio file
- Paste a YouTube link
- Hum a melody into your microphone

The AI analyzes the reference track's rhythm, mood, instrumentation, tempo, and genre, then generates NEW original music that matches the style. This is not copying - it creates original compositions informed by the reference.

**Key API Endpoints**:

| Endpoint | Purpose |
|----------|---------|
| `POST /music/create` | Basic music creation |
| `POST /music/create-advanced` | Advanced creation with full parameters |
| `POST /music/create-instrumental` | Instrumental-only generation |
| `POST /music/extend` | Extend existing songs |
| `POST /files/motif` | Upload melodies/motifs for reference |
| `POST /files/vocal` | Upload custom vocals for voice cloning |
| `GET /music/moods-and-genres` | Available style options |

**Output Formats**:
- MP3
- WAV
- Stems (vocals, instrumental, accompaniment layers separate) - Pro tiers

**Song Length Control**: Yes, up to 5 minutes depending on lyrics

**Instrumental vs Vocal**:
- Dedicated instrumental generation endpoint
- Vocal generation with selectable voice timbres
- Voice cloning available (upload your own voice)

**Supported Models** (latest):
- O2 (newest)
- V7.6
- V7.5

---

### 3. Copyright and Licensing

**Ownership**: Users retain full rights to AI-generated music when contributing meaningful creative input (prompts, edits, style selection)

**Commercial Use**: 100% royalty-free, cleared for commercial use on all paid plans. Includes:
- Video content
- Ads
- Games
- Podcasts
- Social media

**YouTube Content ID Safety**: 
- AI-generated music from Mureka is designed to avoid Content ID claims
- Original compositions with no matching copyrighted material
- Recommendation: Include license details in video description metadata
- YouTube's AI disclosure policy (October 2025) may require labeling AI content

**Best Practice**: Download the license certificate from Mureka and include license details in your video description for Content ID safety.

---

### 4. Comparison to Suno

| Aspect | Mureka | Suno |
|--------|--------|------|
| **Official API** | Yes, official API at [platform.mureka.ai](https://platform.mureka.ai/) | No official public API (third-party only) |
| **Price per Song** | $0.015-0.03/song | ~$0.04/song (third-party) |
| **Sound Quality** | Good, but vocals reported slightly below Suno | Industry-leading vocal quality |
| **Lyrics Quality** | Better than Suno | Decent |
| **Style Matching** | Native feature (upload reference tracks) | Limited |
| **Stems Export** | Yes (paid) | Limited |
| **Concurrent Requests** | Up to 10 | Varies by provider |
| **Generation Time** | ~45 seconds for 2 songs | Similar |
| **Max Length** | 5 minutes | Similar |
| **Commercial Rights** | Included in paid plans | Included in paid plans |
| **Learning Curve** | Steeper interface | Simpler prompt-to-song |
| **Best For** | Developers/API integration, style matching | Polished vocals, quick generation |

**Key Difference**: Mureka is the only AI music service with an official, first-party API. Suno does not offer an official API - all "Suno APIs" are third-party reverse-engineered solutions.

---

### Integration Recommendation for SPLICE

For your video editing plugin, Mureka offers several advantages:

1. **Official API** - Reliable, supported, documented
2. **Reference Track Style Matching** - Users could upload a sample and get similar background music
3. **Instrumental-only endpoint** - Ideal for background music in videos
4. **Stems export** - Useful for mixing/layering in video projects
5. **Competitive pricing** - $0.015-0.03 per generation
6. **Commercial rights included** - Safe for monetized YouTube videos

**Potential API Integration**:
```javascript
// Example endpoint for SPLICE integration
POST /music/create-instrumental
{
  "prompt": "upbeat corporate video background, 120 BPM",
  "duration": 60,  // seconds
  "genre": "corporate",
  "mood": "uplifting"
}

// Or with reference track
POST /music/create-advanced
{
  "reference_url": "https://youtube.com/...",
  "instrumental_only": true,
  "duration": 90
}
```

---

### Sources

- [Mureka Official Site](https://www.mureka.ai/)
- [Mureka API Platform](https://platform.mureka.ai/)
- [Mureka API Documentation](https://platform.mureka.ai/docs/)
- [Mureka API v1 (useapi.net)](https://useapi.net/docs/api-mureka-v1)
- [Mureka vs Suno Comparison](https://singify.fineshare.com/blog/ai-music-apps/suno-vs-mureka)
- [Mureka AI Complete Guide](https://www.mureka.ai/hub/mureka/mureka-ai/)
- [AI Music Copyright Guide](https://www.mureka.ai/hub/aimusic/can-you-monetize-ai-music/)
- [Suno Pricing](https://suno.com/pricing)
- [2025 Mureka Review](https://www.topmediai.com/ai-music/mureka-ai-review/)
